name: Twilio Appointment Reminder QuickStart Tutorial
description: A sample Twilio app that calls a phone reminder and provides an automated reminder

ACCOUNT_SID.description: You can find this on your Twilio Account info page

ACCOUNT_TOKEN.description: You can find this on your Twilio Account info page

CALLER_ID.description: Outgoing Caller ID you have previously validated with Twilio

BASE_URL.description: base URL of this application. Set this with the resolved success URL returned on successful setup
